name: HONG KONG - but random...
description:
Every time you reload the game you land in a brand new randomly generated Hong Kong...

CONTROLS:
WASD = drive
Mouse = look around

Are you from Hong Kong? I would love to get in contact with you! My DM:s are open https://twitter.com/kbrecordzz

Music & audio: https://freesound.org/people/Xcreenplay/sounds/440467/, https://freesound.org/people/mycompasstv/sounds/458112/
